name: UltraTracker Wave File
summary: Learn about .UWF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: UltraTracker was primarily used by music producers and enthusiasts in the demoscene community to create compositions with short samples. The UWF format is a container for raw audio samples that UltraTracker users can loop, layer, or trigger at various pitches and tempos to create instrument-like sounds in their ULT compositions.
NOTE: Since UltraTracker was discontinued, the UWF format has become obsolete.

description: A UWF file is an audio sample file used by the now-discontinued UltraTracker, an audio tracking program popular in the 1990s. It stores audio waveforms that a user can play back and manipulate with UltraTracker when creating module-based music (.ULT files).

instructions: You can open UWF files with UltraTracker in Windows and CocoModX in macOS. However, both programs are discontinued.
